backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented functions.
feature_evidence.json: Report describing implemented frontend features, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variables defining portal color scheme and dark mode settings.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry page mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps pages in the PortalLayout with toast support.
frontend/src/components/ChallanPreviewMo: Modal showing challan details, fine calculation, proof image, and a simulated PDF download.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Simple empty-state component displaying a message with an icon.
Displays driver and road camera images with fallbacks when unavailable.
frontend/src/components/LatestViolationC: Card highlighting the latest violation with proof image, details, and navigation actions.
frontend/src/components/notifications/Po: Implements a global popup notification system with queueing, auto-dismiss, and manual close.
frontend/src/components/PortalLayout.tsx: Defines the main portal layout with header, navigation, footer, and popup notifications wrapper.
frontend/src/components/PortalNav.tsx: Renders top navigation with active route highlighting using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, invalidating queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context and logic for managing Internet Identity login, state, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useInterval.ts: Custom hook for running a callback on a recurring interval respecting React lifecycle.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom color variables and government-themed utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/api.ts: Defines violation API types and fetch helpers, including a stub for challan data.
frontend/src/lib/violations/images.ts: Normalizes violation image URLs, ensuring absolute or prefixed localhost paths.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/ChallanManagementPage: Fetches violations, groups them by vehicle, calculates fines, and displays challan management UI.
frontend/src/pages/ChallanPreviewPage.ts: Loads a specific violation via query params, displays a challan preview with details and fine calculation, and supports PDF download simulation.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows the main dashboard with descriptive system overview and links to violations, challans, and safety compliance sections.
frontend/src/pages/LiveViolationsPage.ts: Fetches and auto-refreshes violation data, detects new violations, triggers notifications, and displays a table with severity and challan modal support.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleDetailsPage.ts: Displays violation history and owner details for a specific vehicle fetched via query params, with score calculation and error handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom color system, typography and container plugins, and responsive container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing system purpose, requirements, architecture notes, and feature tracking for a vehicle safety dashboard.
